description:
Summer break is coming up, but the Light Music Club still hasn`t had a chance to all play together. Anxious, Mio suggests that they hold a training camp during the summer break to prepare for the upcoming school festival. Mio declares that they will practice from dawn until dusk, but Yui and Ritsu are full of suggestions for a fun time, starting by discussing whether they should go to the mountains or the beach.
Source: R1 DVD
